game.name: Train Simulator: C-424
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take the throttle of a notable, and memorable, Alco second-generation diesel – with Diesel Workshop’s striking Century 424 for Train Simulator Classic!
